channel.title: How can i change npc health & raise/reduce item bounses?
channel.description: how can i change npc health & raise/reduce item bounses? please help

item.title: How can i change npc health & raise/reduce item bounses?
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

If it’s in PI (Project Insanity) then you go to /Data/cfg/npc.cfg and then it should be pretty simple from there, just search the npc’s ID and change the health.

And about item bonus’ in the cfg folder open up ’ item.cfg ’ then search the ID or name and follow the line of numbers that correspond to it, the first 3 numbers are shop price, high alch, low alch, then on the others, you might have to play around with them a bit, can’t remember them off the top of my head but the last two are normally strength and prayer.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change npc health & raise/reduce item bounses?
